title: low prio
body: Is there a way to get rid of low priority. I got a 20 min timer for attempting to reconnect. I never leave games the only time it may seem I left a game is if i am attempting now i am getting timers for trying to play the game. Thats some BS.

replies.body:
When you disconnect from a match, it negatively impacts your teammates, regardless of the reason for the disconnection. This is one of the reasons why Leaverbuster treats disconnections equally and penalties cannot be modified. In order to get out of the penalties, you'll need to consistently play without disconnecting from matches. For more info on the Leaverbuster system, check out the [Leaverbuster FAQ.
](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

A common reason for disconnection is an unstable connection to the servers. For this reason, I recommend you work through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to work towards resolving this and avoiding leaver penalties in the future. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
